document_data.name: Tower of Blessed Strength
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Blessed Strength''' was a public garden located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Tower of Blessed Strength was located within the [[Furdah Rustauk District]] in south Dhaztanar. The tower sat along the [[Silk Road]] where it entered Dhaztanar from the east.
document_data.Description: The tower was built into the main wall surrounding Dhaztanar.
